text: Moshe Katsav, Hebrew: משה קצב , (born 5 December 1945 in Yazd, Iran) is a former Israeli politician of Likud. He was mayor of Kiryat Malakhi, a Member of Knesset and a (deputy) government minister. He was also President of Israel from 2000 to 2007. From 2011 to 2016 he was in prison because of a conviction of sexual offences (like rape). Katsav denied the accusations. == Other websites == * Bio at Knesset Website Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy government ministers of Israel Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Iranian Jews Category:Israeli mayors Category:Israeli prisoners Category:Jewish Israeli criminals Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Likud politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Presidents of Israel Category:Rapists
title: Moshe Katsav
